blogthemeception

09 Jan 2013

Meta post!

I knew that I wanted to differentiate my blog visually when it arose from the dead. I did not want to use the default theme provided by whatever blogging platform I eventually settled on.

After looking around at many static site generators, I settled on http://octopress.org/ and perused the 3rd party themes. I found a nice clean theme but there was a tiny problem. It wasnâ€™t packaged up so that I could, with one command, install it. (OH THE HORROR! Someone on the internet gave away something for free yet I still had to do some work to get it to work for me.)

Being a good open source citizen, I decided to package it up to make it easier for others to use. Voila! You too can now have the awesomeness of the justin-kelly-theme. Enjoy!
